text: IHOP may refer to: * International House of Pancakes, known as IHOP * Dine Brands Global, formerly known as "IHOP Corporation" and "dineEquity" * International House of Prayer, an evangelical charismatic Pentecostal Christian missions organization in Kansas City, Missouri * Information Hyperlinked over Proteins, or iHOP, is a web portal on gene and protein interactions mostly derived from abstracts of scientific publications
title: IHOP (disambiguation)
